title: Sam Smith: Genuine England
creator_credit: Shaw Ashton, Andrew Lee and Arts Council of Great Britain
brief_description: An insight into the life and work of Sam Smith, doll-maker extraordinaire. He relates snippets from his life as he discusses the making of his unusual dolls.
creator_credit_for_label: Shaw Ashton, Andrew Lee and Arts Council of Great Britain
